Reference

All functions

addins.rs

A Set of RStudio Add-ins.

rs_insert_arrow_rl() rs_insert_arrow_rl2() rs_insert_arrow_lr() rs_insert_arrow_lr2()

Insert arrow (->, ->>, <-, <<-).

rs_insert_line_ss() rs_insert_line_ds() rs_insert_line_sw()

Insert various lines.

rs_insert_pipe() rs_insert_update_pipe() rs_insert_exposition_pipe() rs_insert_tee_pipe()

Insert magrittr operators.

rs_replace_slash_bs2d() rs_replace_slash_bd2s() rs_replace_slash_b2fw() rs_replace_slash_fw2b()

Replace slash.

rs_align_code() rs_align_code_at_equal() rs_align_code_at_arrow() rs_align_code_at_pipe()

Align code at certain symbols.

rs_enclose_with_percent()

Enclose with %%.

rs_insert_infix_in()

Insert %in%.

rs_insert_infix_not_in()

Insert %!in%.

rs_insert_infix_R()

Insert %R%.

rs_insert_integer_division()

Insert %/%.

rs_insert_matrix_multiplication()

Insert %*%.

rs_insert_modulo()

Insert %%.
